ruleContent.content:
if(title.match(/\.doc|\.xls|\.pdf/)){ h=java.getString("@@class.doc-content@html",false); if(h==""){ data=result.match(/pureViewPageData = (\{[\s\S]+?\}) \|\|/)[1]; json=JSON.parse(data); list=json.readerInfo2019.htmlUrls.json; png=json.readerInfo2019.htmlUrls.png; h=""; for(i in list){ html=java.ajax(list[i].pageLoadUrl); $=html.match(/wenku_\d+\(([\s\S]+)\)/)[1]; $=JSON.parse($); list2=$.body; for(j in list2){ if(String(list2[j].c).match(/^\s{1,5}$/)){ c="
" }else{ c=list2[j].c } if(list2[j].t=="pic"){ c='' } h+=c } h+="
" }} result=h }else{ if(result.match(/class="txt/)){ org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select(".txt").html()} else{ md5=result.match(/"md5sum":"([^"]+)"/)[1]; token=result.match(/"downloadToken":"([^"]+)"/)[1]; imglist=eval(result.match(/"bcsParam":(\[[\s\S]+?\])/)[1]); html=''; for(i in imglist){ url='https://wkretype.bdimg.com/retype/zoom/'+token+'?pn='+parseInt(imglist[i].page)+'&x=0&y=0&raww=1080&rawh=810&o=jpg_6&type=pic&aimh=810'+md5+imglist[i].zoom; html+='\n' } result=html } } ##‚Äö(.*?)‚Äõ##‚Äú$1‚Äù
